exchanges.name: PancakeSwap
exchanges.notes: Subgraph API is public and free. REST API may be deprecated. The Graph free tier has rate limits.

exchanges.name: Uniswap

is_paid.routing_api: Free tier available, paid plans for higher limits

exchanges.notes: Subgraph API is free and public. Uniswap Labs Routing API requires API key (x-api-key header). Default limit: 12 requests/second.
